markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Know-It-All](/Feats.aspx?ID=197) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 45, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 102 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[[Bard](/Classes.aspx?ID=3)] [enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

When you succeed at a Knowledge check, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM’s discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.
name: Know-It-All
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 45</row>

**Prerequisites**
[[Bard](/Classes.aspx?ID=3)] [enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your knowledge of the world expands beyond what you have read.
</summary>
